import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import logo from '../../assets/logo.png' import Search from '../../assets/search.svg' import './Navbar.css' import Avatar from '../Avatar/Avatar' import {useSelector ,useDispatch} from 'react-redux' import { setCurrentUser } from '../../actions/currentUser' const Navbar = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch() // var user=JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('Profile')) var user =useSelector((state) => (state.currentUserReducer)); useEffect(()=>{ dispatch (setCurrentUser(JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('Profile'))))},[dispatch]) return (
About Products For Teams
{ user === null? Log in : <> {user.result.name.charAt(0).toUpperCase} }
) } export default Navbar
